column5: Hey all, Can anyone point me in the right direction to by spot tailed minnows near Callander? I am heading up in 2 weeks and want to have some for the trip.  Thanks, Chris
Bowman's Bait.   BY FAR the best minnows in that area.
Thanks Cram. Spoke to them. Very helpful and decent prices.  Chris
Best minnows as well.  By far.
Bowmans is great.. however they are on the south shores of Nipissing, and not Callander.
